line_1: While from their treacherous wiles my life is insecure.
line_2: My friends, my followers they basely lure;

line_1: While from their treacherous wiles my life is insecure.
line_2: My castle vainly have I built so sure
To leave it safe and draw it pure.

line_1: Wisdom to know all bliss is insecure,
line_2: Courage to hope, and patience to endure.
